Paul<S>3972</S>, called<S>2822</S> to be an apostle<S>652</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> through<S>1223</S> the will<S>2307</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> Sosthenes<S>4988</S> our brother<S>80</S>,
Unto the church<S>1577</S> of God<S>2316</S> which<S>3588</S> is<S>5607</S> at<S>1722</S> Corinth<S>2882</S>, to them that are sanctified<S>37</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, called<S>2822</S> to be saints<S>40</S>, with<S>4862</S> all<S>3956</S> that in<S>1722</S> every<S>3956</S> place<S>5117</S> call upon<S>1941</S> the name<S>3686</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S>, both<S>5037</S> theirs<S>846</S> and<S>2532</S> ours<S>2257</S>:
Grace<S>5485</S> be unto you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> peace<S>1515</S>, from<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S> our<S>2257</S> Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> from the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
I thank<S>2168</S> my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S> always<S>3842</S> on<S>4012</S> your<S>5216</S> behalf<S>4012</S>, for<S>1909</S> the grace<S>5485</S> of God<S>2316</S> which<S>3588</S> is given<S>1325</S> you<S>5213</S> by<S>1722</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>;
That<S>3754</S> in<S>1722</S> every thing<S>3956</S> ye are enriched<S>4148</S> by<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>, in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> utterance<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> in all<S>3956</S> knowledge<S>1108</S>;
Even as<S>2531</S> the testimony<S>3142</S> of Christ<S>5547</S> was confirmed<S>950</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>:
So that<S>5620</S> ye<S>5209</S> come behind<S>5302</S> in<S>1722</S> no<S>3361</S> <S>3367</S> gift<S>5486</S>; waiting for<S>553</S> the coming<S>602</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>: <sup>coming: Gr. revelation</sup>
Who<S>3739</S> shall<S>950</S> also<S>2532</S> confirm<S>950</S> you<S>5209</S> unto<S>2193</S> the end<S>5056</S>, that ye may be blameless<S>410</S> in<S>1722</S> the day<S>2250</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
God<S>2316</S> is faithful<S>4103</S>, by<S>1223</S> whom<S>3739</S> ye were called<S>2564</S> unto<S>1519</S> the fellowship<S>2842</S> of his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> I beseech<S>3870</S> you<S>5209</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, by<S>1223</S> the name<S>3686</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye<S>3004</S> all<S>3956</S> speak<S>3004</S> the same thing<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> that there be<S>5600</S> no<S>3361</S> divisions<S>4978</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>; but<S>1161</S> that ye be<S>5600</S> perfectly joined together<S>2675</S> in<S>1722</S> the same<S>846</S> mind<S>3563</S> and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the same<S>846</S> judgment<S>1106</S>. <sup>divisions: Gr. schisms</sup>
For<S>1063</S> it hath been declared<S>1213</S> unto me<S>3427</S> of<S>4012</S> you<S>5216</S>, my<S>3450</S> brethren<S>80</S>, by<S>5259</S> them which are of the house<S>3588</S> of Chloe<S>5514</S>, that<S>3754</S> there are<S>1526</S> contentions<S>2054</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> this<S>5124</S> I say<S>3004</S>, that<S>3754</S> every one<S>1538</S> of you<S>5216</S> saith<S>3004</S>, I<S>1473</S> <S>3303</S> am<S>1510</S> of Paul<S>3972</S>; and<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> of Apollos<S>625</S>; and<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> of Cephas<S>2786</S>; and<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>.
Is<S>3307</S> Christ<S>5547</S> divided<S>3307</S>?<S>3361</S> was<S>4717</S> Paul<S>3972</S> crucified<S>4717</S> for<S>5228</S> you<S>5216</S>? or<S>2228</S> were ye baptized<S>907</S> in<S>1519</S> the name<S>3686</S> of Paul<S>3972</S>?
I thank<S>2168</S> God<S>2316</S> that<S>3754</S> I baptized<S>907</S> none<S>3762</S> of you<S>5216</S>, but<S>1508</S> Crispus<S>2921</S> and<S>2532</S> Gaius<S>1050</S>;
Lest<S>3363</S> any<S>5100</S> should say<S>2036</S> that<S>3754</S> I had baptized<S>907</S> in<S>1519</S> mine own<S>1699</S> name<S>3686</S>.
And<S>1161</S> I baptized<S>907</S> also<S>2532</S> the household<S>3624</S> of Stephanas<S>4734</S>: besides<S>3063</S>, I know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> whether I baptized<S>907</S> any<S>1536</S> other<S>243</S>.
For<S>1063</S> Christ<S>5547</S> sent<S>649</S> me<S>3165</S> not<S>3756</S> to baptize<S>907</S>, but<S>235</S> to preach the gospel<S>2097</S>: not<S>3756</S> with<S>1722</S> wisdom<S>4678</S> of words<S>3056</S>, lest<S>3363</S> the cross<S>4716</S> of Christ<S>5547</S> should be made of none effect<S>2758</S>. <sup>words: or, speech</sup>
For<S>1063</S> the preaching<S>3056</S> of the cross<S>4716</S> is<S>2076</S> to them<S>3303</S> that perish<S>622</S> foolishness<S>3472</S>; but<S>1161</S> unto us<S>2254</S> which are saved<S>4982</S> it is<S>2076</S> the power<S>1411</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
For<S>1063</S> it is written<S>1125</S>, I will destroy<S>622</S> the wisdom<S>4678</S> of the wise<S>4680</S>, and<S>2532</S> will bring to nothing<S>114</S> the understanding<S>4907</S> of the prudent<S>4908</S>.
Where<S>4226</S> is the wise<S>4680</S>? where<S>4226</S> is the scribe<S>1122</S>? where<S>4226</S> is the disputer<S>4804</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>165</S>? hath<S>3471</S> not<S>3780</S> God<S>2316</S> made foolish<S>3471</S> the wisdom<S>4678</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>2889</S>?
For<S>1063</S> after<S>1894</S> that in<S>1722</S> the wisdom<S>4678</S> of God<S>2316</S> the world<S>2889</S> by<S>1223</S> wisdom<S>4678</S> knew<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> God<S>2316</S>, it pleased<S>2106</S> God<S>2316</S> by<S>1223</S> the foolishness<S>3472</S> of preaching<S>2782</S> to save<S>4982</S> them that believe<S>4100</S>.
For<S>2532</S> <S>1894</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> require<S>154</S> a sign<S>4592</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Greeks<S>1672</S> seek<S>2212</S> after wisdom<S>4678</S>:
But<S>1161</S> we<S>2249</S> preach<S>2784</S> Christ<S>5547</S> crucified<S>4717</S>, unto the Jews<S>2453</S> a stumblingblock<S>3303</S> <S>4625</S>, and<S>1161</S> unto the Greeks<S>1672</S> foolishness<S>3472</S>;
But<S>1161</S> unto them<S>846</S> which<S>3588</S> are called<S>2822</S>, both<S>5037</S> Jews<S>2453</S> and<S>2532</S> Greeks<S>1672</S>, Christ<S>5547</S> the power<S>1411</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> the wisdom<S>4678</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
Because<S>3754</S> the foolishness<S>3474</S> of God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> wiser than<S>4680</S> men<S>444</S>; and<S>2532</S> the weakness<S>772</S> of God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> stronger than<S>2478</S> men<S>444</S>.
For<S>1063</S> ye see<S>991</S> your<S>5216</S> calling<S>2821</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, how that<S>3754</S> not<S>3756</S> many<S>4183</S> wise men<S>4680</S> after<S>2596</S> the flesh<S>4561</S>, not<S>3756</S> many<S>4183</S> mighty<S>1415</S>, not<S>3756</S> many<S>4183</S> noble<S>2104</S>, are called:
But<S>235</S> God<S>2316</S> hath chosen<S>1586</S> the foolish things<S>3474</S> of the world<S>2889</S> to<S>2443</S> confound<S>2617</S> the wise<S>4680</S>; and<S>2532</S> God<S>2316</S> hath chosen<S>1586</S> the weak things<S>772</S> of the world<S>2889</S> to<S>2443</S> confound<S>2617</S> the things which are mighty<S>2478</S>;
And<S>2532</S> base things<S>36</S> of the world<S>2889</S>, and<S>2532</S> things which are despised<S>1848</S>, hath<S>1586</S> God<S>2316</S> chosen<S>1586</S>, yea, and<S>2532</S> things which<S>3588</S> are<S>5607</S> not<S>3361</S>, to<S>2443</S> bring to nought<S>2673</S> things that are<S>5607</S>:
That<S>3704</S> no<S>3361</S> <S>3956</S> flesh<S>4561</S> should glory<S>2744</S> in his presence<S>1799</S> <S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> of<S>1537</S> him<S>846</S> are<S>2075</S> ye<S>5210</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, who<S>3739</S> of<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S> is made<S>1096</S> unto us<S>2254</S> <S>5037</S> wisdom<S>4678</S>, and righteousness<S>1343</S>, and<S>2532</S> sanctification<S>38</S>, and<S>2532</S> redemption<S>629</S>:
That<S>2443</S>, according as<S>2531</S> it is written<S>1125</S>, He that glorieth<S>2744</S>, let him glory<S>2744</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
